description: Bulk dump streaming ingest: normalize, scrub PII, generate canonical keys, and idempotently persist telemetry dumps into Postgres+AGE.
steps: Implement streaming upload endpoint with incremental parsing and explicit format-detection (CSV/TSV/Excel/NDJSON/compressed archives).
Implement staging and record-streaming infrastructure with backpressure and bounded buffers.
Implement normalizers, canonical-key generation, and local deduplication.
Integrate the PII policy enforcement module (redact/hash/transform actions) and add a pre/post persistence validation sweep.
Implement enrichment hooks that can run synchronously or asynchronously and preserve provenance.
Implement idempotent merge operations for the Postgres+AGE graph (MERGE-style Cypher or upserts) with batching and retries.
Add unit + integration tests for format detection, streaming parsing, normalization, PII enforcement, and idempotent writes (including malformed and large inputs).
Add observability: ingest metrics, memory footprints, and a human-readable ingest report.
